dialog.text: Hello\nWould you like to know more about keep?
dialog.answer: Yes, I'm new here, please tell me.
I'm in a hurry, can you help me?
I'm in a hurry, maybe another time.

dialog.text: Well, this is a bit embarrasing.\nI just wanted to sound smart, you know.\nNoone ever wanted to know something about this town and honestly, I don't know anything about it either...
dialog.answer: No, it's ok. After all, it was worth the try.
How dare you... If fighting were implemented I would so kill you, u n00b!!111

dialog.text: I'm glad you have no hard feelings. But ask me in a few days, maybe I'll have found out something about this place by then.\n\n Have a nice day.
Look, I'm really sorry to have upset you... \n\n hm... do you want an apple instead?
dialog.answer: No, I don't want anything from you.
Yes, that would be very kind of you.

dialog.text: I've seen an apple laying in the grass over there.\n If you hurry, it might still be there.
You there!\nWhat are you looking at me?
dialog.answer: I want to sell my goods!

dialog.text: Where would you like to go?
dialog.answer: I think I'll stay here for a bit.
